Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock hit 74 off 40 balls
Andries Gous scored an unbeaten 80 off 47 balls
South Africa set USA 195 to win
USA chased 195 but fell short by 18 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Quinton de Kock expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
South Africa leap into the lead in Group 2
USA captain Aaron Jones acknowledged the need for discipline in their bowling
Miscellaneous Highlights: Andries Gous and Harmeet Singh's late-innings hitting set an imposing target
South Africa's Anrich Nortje conceded just seven runs off the final over
